title: Diagnose Shovel Hydraulic Fault
description: A shovel operator reports a 'low hydraulic pressure' alarm. A reliability engineer must diagnose the fault remotely.

tasks.description: Retrieve the last 24 hours of sensor data from the shovel's hydraulic system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A timeseries dataset of pressures and temperatures is retrieved.

tasks.description: Analyze the data and correlate the pressure drop with an increase in hydraulic oil temperature.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis suggests a possible internal leak in a hydraulic pump.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority work order for a technician to inspect the specific hydraulic pump for leaks.
tasks.expected_outcome: A diagnostic work order is created and dispatched to a technician with a clear recommendation of what to check.
